channel.title: Messed up my prices, now it won't load
channel.description: Tried to change the phat store prices, and messed up the code somewhere, gives me this error: [code]Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:311) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27)[/code] please help, if you wouldn't mind. I would rather take the whole "phat" part of the item list with set prices,but no one will probably do that lol. thanks :).

item.title: Messed up my prices, now it won't load
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Not alaways what that means… out of bounds exception can mean alot of things…

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up my prices, now it won't load
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

looks to me like maby just maby…
it itemHandler.java at line 311 or line 39, you might have messed up… Try making sure that you didn’t do someting like set a price above 2147m, the compiler cannot decetc this but the server can, also make sure you didn’t make an invalid object spawn somewhere…

item.title: Messed up my prices, now it won't load

item.description:
@Darklight_Ryan wrote:

Tried to change the phat store prices, and messed up the code somewhere, gives me this error:

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:311) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27)
please help, if you wouldn’t mind.
I would rather take the whole “phat” part of the item list with set prices,but no one will probably do that lol.
thanks :).
